articles.title: Apple Watch hypertension alerts cleared by FDA for new and old watches - The Verge
articles.description: The blood pressure monitor arrives with watchOS 26 next week.

articles.title: Borderlands 4 is off to a 'Mixed' start on Steam — here's why - Windows Central
articles.description: Borderlands 4 is off to a strong start on Steam in terms of player count, but serious issues with its PC performance are ruining the fun for many.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 17 event recap: Reactions to iPhone Air, Apple Watches, AirPods Pro 3, more - ZDNET
articles.description: ZDNET rounded up all the news surrounding this week's Apple event, including the iPhone 17 series, which starts at $799, Apple Watch Ultra 3, AirPods Pro 3, and more.

articles.title: "We Fully Agree": Bungie Admits Destiny 2 Ash & Iron Power Climb Feels "Way Off," Promises Immediate Fixes and Reward Buffs - The Game Post
articles.description: Bungie admits Destiny 2’s Ash & Iron power progression is broken. The studio is rolling out immediate reward buffs, score changes, and Prime drop boosts, starting this week.

articles.title: Google pokes Apple over its struggles with AI intelligence on the iPhone 17 - Android Central
articles.description: After Apple's latest event, Google's having some fun of its own, poking fun at the competition over its AI struggles.
